title: Hand-drawn 3D outline caps
content:
Hi folks,

Can anyone suggest a typeface similar to the one in the photo? So far I've found [Rickety](http://web.archive.org/web/20140829235815/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/typetrust/rickety_ot/) and [Blockhead](http://web.archive.org/web/20140829235815/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/emigre/blockhead/), but I would be grateful for any more ideas. :)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [melangerie\_etsy.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20140829235815/http:/typophile.com/files/melangerie_etsy.png) | 418.75 KB |
author: lunasoleil

comments.content:
C rial  
 [http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/joebob/c-rial/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140829235815/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/joebob/c-rial/ "http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/joebob/c-rial/")

You can find something more searching for 3D or 3-D on MyFonts.
